p: Approximately 1 mg HPCD and 1 mg of the inclusion complex samples were placed in an agate mortar with about 100 mg dry potassium bromide to form a fine powder, respectively. The sample was then mixed well, loaded into a mold, pressed into tablets, and placed in the Bruker Tensor II FT-IR spectrometer (Karlsruhe, Germany) for testing, respectively. The SAEO tablet sample was prepared by adding a drop of SAEO to the potassium bromide tablet.
